name: Overbooked (Mikhail Shubin)
description:
Local cooperation game for two players about working in a hotel.

You control two hotel employers, trying to satisfy demanding requests of hotel guests, from champagne and coffee to taking out garbage.

This is very early version of the game. However, it is completely playable.

Controls

First player uses [W][A][S][D]

Second player uses [arrow keys]

[space] - change characters and pause

[esc] - exit

[F1][F2][F3] - change resolution (small - large - fullscreen)

[F4] - sound on/off

Game Modes

Leisure: no score, no time limit, maximal number of active orders is limited.

Work: normal difficulty.

Capitalism: hard difficulty; you get penalties for overdue orders. No simple "just asking" orders.

Plans for the Future
  • More levels! 
  • More things to do: room service, kitchen and laundry
  • More characters!
  • Better game balance
  • Better sound and visuals
  • Controller support
  • Adjustable controls
  • Include Level editor in the package
  • Single-player mode

I don't have much free time to work on this project. Do you wish for some feature in particular? Please tell about it in the comments so I can prioritise it.

Credits

Mikhail Shubin, 2020

Made with pygame, published with cx-Freeze. All sprites are hand-made with pain.net.
